mapper.select: SELECT DP.DEPT_CD AS code, DP.DEPT_NM AS name FROM DEPTS DP WHERE AVF <= CURDATE() AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM DEPTS WHERE DEPT_CD = DP.DEPT_CD AND AVF <= CURDATE() AND AVF > DP.AVF )
SELECT POS.POS_CD AS code, POS.POS_NM AS name FROM POSITIONS POS WHERE AVF <= CURDATE() AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM POSITIONS WHERE POS_CD = POS.POS_CD AND AVF <= CURDATE() AND AVF > POS.AVF )
SELECT CODE AS code, CODE_NM AS name FROM CODEMST WHERE CODE_ID = #{id}
